name: AS_GSS_TMG_CPS_manageReferenceTemplateCategory
description: Manage tasks for a template within a single category
sail_code:
{
  rule!AS_GSS_TMG_COL_taskCategoryHeader(
    triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
    i18nData: ri!i18nData,
    addingTaskCategory: ri!addingTaskCategory,
    taskCategory: ri!taskCategory,
    buttonLabel: "Add Task"
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_TMG_GRD_manageReferenceTemplateCategoryGrid(
    i18nData: ri!i18nData,
    taskCategory: ri!taskCategory,
    selectedTemplate: ri!selectedTemplate
  )
}
